title: The Queen's Head
text: is not only the town centre pub but the beating heart of Farnham hospitality full of atmosphere, famous food, incredible live music and an abundance of events. This family run pub is a proper boozer, an amazing dining experience, a vegan destination, a full-on original live music venue… its truly unique. A pub that delivers on quality, service and value but is unpretentious, down-to-earth and not afraid to be different. Whether food, fun or rockin’ out we’ve got you covered.
